summary: Adds 3 new unique standalone followers. Bree, Ash and Myst the Dryads.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][center][size=6][img]http://i57.tinypic.com/20fuo9w.jpg[/img]
[/size][size=3][font=Tahoma][color=#92d050]They're fully standalone, their leaf outfits and horns are included, no other mods are needed.[/color][/font]
[/size][b][b][font=Tahoma][size=6][color=#92d050]
Description[/color][/size][/font][/b][/b]

[color=#000000][font=Tahoma][color=#ffffff][font=Tahoma]Bree, Ash and Myst grew up as normal Nord children, but the sisters had a tragic accident at a young age, sadly all three perished in a fire while their parents could do nothing. After finding out what happened to their beloved children, they searched for a way to bring them back. Their parents stumbled upon a sorcerer to cast dark magic on their souls. The only way they could've been saved, was if their souls were bound with another humanoid creature. The only creature possible was the Spriggan. Their parents were not happy about what they had to do, but would do anything to have their children back.The sorcerer bound their souls to Spriggans, they were not the same looking, but still had the souls they always have had. Due to their human soul, their body started to take the original human look, soon becoming a Dryad. They acquired the same magic as the Spriggans, and used it to their advantage.[/font]
[/color][/font][/color][size=6][b][b][font=Tahoma][color=#92d050]
Requirements[/color][/font][/b]
[/b][/size]

[size=2]-Skyrim Version 1.9.32.0.8 or higher.[/size]

[b][size=6][b][font=Tahoma][size=6][color=#92d050]Installation [/color][/size][/font][/b][/size][/b]

Download and install with NMM or manually download and unpack the file and then move the “data” folder to your Skyrim data folder. This mod has a single esp. This mod is not made for a torrented game, and If you have any problems using it with a torrent game, I will not provide support.

[b][size=6][b][font=Tahoma][size=6][color=#92d050]Uninstallation [/color][/size][/font][/b][/size][/b]

Uninstall with NMM or manually delete all the files that came in the “data” folder listed in the mod.

[size=6][b][b][font=Tahoma][color=#92d050]Notes[/color][/font][/b][/b]
[/size]
Each follower has customized combat, and their combat is based on a spriggan, such as their spells. Due to their unique look, I understand not everyone will like them, please keep negative comments to yourself. Unp, Cbbe, and BBP-TBBP body options are available. If you have a problem where there are leaves swirling around the feet of your character, there is a fix under optional files. They are marriageable and essential. User photos are greatly appreciated, as well as endorsements if you enjoy the mod. 

[size=6][b][b][font=Tahoma][color=#92d050]Where Can I find Them?[/color][/font][/b][/b][/size]

[size=4][b]Dragonsreach in Whiterun[/b][/size]
